attributes.action: Create a research facility for IEC Fusion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Inertial Electromagnetic Confinement Fusion, also known as Polywell fusion, has shown great potential to provide cheap clean energy for the 21st Century.
 
Let the UK take the lead in this exciting technology and provide facilities for a full size research reactor. 

Let the UK gift the world with safe abundant power which would free us from the limitations of Fossil Fuels and take Mankind to the stars.
